personalInfo.name: Mohamed Amine Belgareg
personalInfo.title: Data Analyst || Business Intelligence Developer || web developer
personalInfo.bio:
Naturally curious and observant, I constantly take on new challenges and actively seek opportunities to learn and share knowledge.
 I enjoy solving problems with data, whether it’s developing analytical solutions to optimize business performance or creating interactive data visualizations to support better decision-making.
 My work involves advanced data analysis, predictive modeling, building interactive reports with Power BI, and implementing ETL processes to ensure data quality and reliability. I also enjoy mentoring and knowledge sharing with colleagues and industry professionals.

education.institution: Higher Institute of Technological Studies of Rades
education.description: Developed expertise in Business Intelligence and data analysis, mastering tools like Power BI, SSIS, SSAS, SSMS, SQL Server, SSPS, Python, R, and Excel. Gained skills in project management, data warehousing, and database management, while strengthening teamwork, management, and economic analysis abilities.

education.institution: Higher Institute of Computer Science Mahdia
education.description: Comprehensive education in web and mobile development with programming languages such as Java and C. Acquired solid knowledge in algorithms and UML design. Enhanced communication, teamwork, and leadership skills through active participation in university clubs.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Economics and Management
education.description: Built a strong foundation in management and economic principles, covering economic analysis, business strategy, and financial management. Developed analytical and problem-solving skills through practical applications and real-world scenarios.

experience.description: Actively contributed to the General Census of Population and Housing 2024, organized by the Ministry of Economy and Planning. Collected and validated demographic and social data, ensuring high accuracy in recording household composition, education levels, and economic activities.
highlights: Strengthened communication skills by engaging with diverse communities.
Quickly developed solutions to overcome challenges during fieldwork.
Gained hands-on experience in the data lifecycle, from collection to visualization.

experience.description: Led data collection and transformation processes to support business intelligence solutions for sales and production data analysis (2017–2023).
highlights: Collected and normalized data from ERP (MFG Pro), SQL Server, Excel, and CSV files.
Developed and automated ETL pipelines using SSIS for seamless data integration.
Created a tabular cube in Analysis Services with KPIs, hierarchies, and calculated measures.
Designed and deployed interactive Power BI dashboards to improve decision-making.

experience.description: Designed and developed web solutions to improve the customer experience and optimize business operations.
highlights: Conducted UX/UI analysis of Toyota websites to identify and resolve user experience issues.
Developed a custom e-commerce application to enhance client interactions and simplify order management.
Created an analytical dashboard to monitor sales and services, providing actionable business insights.

volunteer.organization: Tunisian Red Crescent - Local Committee of Téboursouk
volunteer.description: Oversee financial reporting, manage donation evaluation and collection, ensure proper distribution of funds, and contribute to organizing social, health, and emergency activities.

volunteer.organization: Tunisian Red Crescent - Local Committee of Rades
volunteer.description: Actively participated in social activities, first aid, and various sanitary and community initiatives. Contributed to awareness campaigns, provided support during health crises, and engaged in social projects, enhancing skills in crisis management and humanitarian assistance.

Developed event briefs, organized events, and coordinated with trainers. Managed event logistics to ensure smooth execution. Fostered strong relationships with trainers and participants to enhance event quality.

volunteer.organization: Tunisian Red Crescent - Local Committee of Mahdia
volunteer.description: Actively participated in social activities, first aid, and various sanitary and community initiatives. Contributed to awareness campaigns, provided support during health crises, and engaged in social projects, enhancing skills in crisis management and humanitarian assistance.
Active Member of the Microsoft ISIMA Club, where I developed soft skills including effective communication and teamwork.
